mapper.select: SELECT count(TAG) AS count, SYS_DICT.CODE AS code, SYS_DICT.NAME AS tag FROM T_ARTICLE LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT ON tag = SYS_DICT.CODE WHERE T_ARTICLE.IS_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY SYS_DICT.NAME, SYS_DICT.CODE
select TITLE,ID,UPDATE_TIME from T_ARTICLE order by UPDATE_TIME desc limit 5

SELECT ARTICLE.ID, ARTICLE.TITLE, ARTICLE.CONTENT, ARTICLE.IS_RELEASE, ARTICLE.UPDATE_TIME, ARTICLE.CREATE_TIME, ARTICLE.ORDER_NUM, DICT.CODE AS TAG FROM T_ARTICLE ARTICLE LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT DICT ON ARTICLE.TAG = DICT.CODE WHERE ARTICLE.IS_DELETE = 0 AND ARTICLE.ID = #{id}
